title: L’Oréal Paris Honors Women of Worth
itunes:title: L’Oréal Paris Honors Women of Worth
description:
Ali Goldstein, L’Oréal Paris USA President, discusses the Women of Worth initiative, recognizing the philanthropic achievements of ten non-profit female leaders from across the nation.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
